stimulusHtml: A typical bag of fertilizer contains high levels of nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium but trace amounts of magnesium and calcium. Which of the following best matches the fertilizer component with the molecule in which it will be incorporated by organisms in the area?
choicesHtml: Nitrogen will be incorporated into nucleic acids.
Phosphorus will be incorporated into amino acids.
Potassium will be incorporated into lipids.
Magnesium will be incorporated into carbohydrates.
